body:
Hi guys i want to add my Youtube name to my channel but i cant because a space is an invalid character and if i click on it, it says 404 missing name because of the space.
Please help.
If you want to see my YouTube name to fix it here it is: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnf7xaAqwrWVuXAVFDbjLXg
Also check out my first avicus video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BYew1pick9M
And second: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ur5OEyvhmn0
Does this happen to any of you?
Thanks, Matt
body_tagged:

title: I cant link YouTube name to my account - Help

replies.body: You should consider adding a custom URL to your channel, which can be done in your channel settings. Otherwise, you'd have to put the end of your URL as your channel name, which in your case would be UCnf7xaAqwrWVuXAVFDbjLXg.
replies.body_tagged: You should consider adding a custom URL to your channel, which can be done in your channel settings. Otherwise, you'd have to put the end of your URL as your channel name, which in your case would be UCnf7xaAqwrWVuXAVFDbjLXg.

replies.body:
Correct me if they changed it, but don't you need to have like 500+ subs in order to change it?

@OP: Yeah I have the same problem. I just linked Stormz's channel since he had me featured :P
replies.body_tagged:
Correct me if they changed it, but don't you need to have like 500+ subs in order to change it?

@OP: Yeah I have the same problem. I just linked Stormz's channel since he had me featured :P

replies.body: Nope, I don't think there's a requirement since I changed mine at the start of my channel.
